alert.note: Alert for Lee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 3:52PM EDT until April 06 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 352 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smithville, or 9 miles north of Leesburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithville, Olivers Mill, Neyami, Scrutchins and Chokee. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Georgia.
